description: ff. 146. 282 x 205; 220 x 135 mm. 36/37 lin. Maghribi. 17th/18th cen. Second half of an unidentified commentary on the work of Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī. Incip. (Kitāb al-buyūʻ): ... باب ىنعقد البىع بما ىدل ... قوله وبمعنى فىقول بعتك اى کذلك ىنعقد
subject: Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī, -1365?—Mukhtaṣar.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
